/usr/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/mpi_gpu_allreduce.dir/mpi-gpu-allreduce.cu.o -o mpi_gpu_allreduce  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib:/opt/amazon/openmpi/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib/libnccl.so /opt/amazon/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
